name: inspection_date
description: Date on which the inspection was completed.

name: operable
description: Whether the hydrant was operable during the test.

name: functional_impediment
description: Whether there were any fuctional impediments observed.

name: impediment_type
description: Types(s) of impediments to the functionality of the hydrant.

name: maintenence_referred
description: Whether maintenance or a referral to the water department is needed.

name: private_hydrant
description: Whether the hydrant is private as opposed to a public water supply.

name: notes
description: Additional notes regarding the hydrant inspection.
